templates.content: DSW cannot accept returns for items purchased from our site. The only return/exchange options available for orders placed on our site can be found here: https://naturalizer.attn.tv/aSOsO41gCfm8
templates.name: Can DSW accept returns for items purchased online?

templates.content: As soon as Zip is notified of the return, you will be refunded the amount you've paid to date and Zip cancels all future payments. In the event of a partial refund, scheduled installments are cancelled first, and then paid installments are refunded. Refunds can take 2-3 business days to process, depending on the financial institution.
templates.name: How do returns, refunds, and partial refunds work if I used ZIP?

templates.content: Shoes must be returned in their original shoe box.
templates.name: Can I return my shoes without the box?

templates.content: Yes! You can check them out here: https://www.naturalizer.com/womens-shoes/boots/waterproof-boots
templates.name: Do you have waterproof shoes?

templates.content: Yes, the arch support on our Contour Plus technology may help to alleviate some of the pain caused by plantar fasciitis by distributing pressure, and they can also help to prevent further damage to the plantar fascia.
templates.name: I have medical issues. Are your shoes good for bunions, fasciitis, etc?

templates.content: I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. We do not provide discounts if offer/deals/sales happen after the day of purchase.
templates.name: Do you price match a sale? I purchased before the on-going sale, can the discount be refunded?

templates.content: Our shoes are manufactured in several countries around the world: China, Vietnam, Bangladesh, India, Cambodia and Brazil.
templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?

templates.content: No, we don't. Our site is our online catalog.

templates.content: Only our shoes with removable footbeds can be replaced with other insoles or orthotics.

templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-888-294-1648 Monday through Friday 9am to 6pm and Saturday 10am to 5pm CST or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.content: Yes, we offer sizes from 4-12 and widths Medium, Narrow, and Wide in some styles depending on availability. You can find the list of sizes in our mega menu to shop by size or width.

templates.content:
We stand behind the quality of our products and if you feel your shoes have a manufacturing defect, or if you have any questions concerning your order,  please feel free to e-mail us 
via this link: https://naturalizer.custhelp.com/app/ask/ or call our toll- free customer service number  at 1-888- 294- 1648.
templates.name: Warranty policy

templates.content: If returns are made via happy returns bar, refunds happen immediately and depend on the bank to show the money on your account. For returns via happy returns mail, we will issue the refund once we get the item in our DC - this may take a while.
templates.name: How long do refunds take?

templates.content: Our retailers are Famous Footwear and DSW. You can also find us at a store near you here: https://www.naturalizer.com/stores?icid=Footer_Help_StoreLocator

templates.content: We don't offer repairs. I'm really sorry for the inconvenience.

templates.content: Happy to help! I'd recommend taking a look at our size chart on each product page and the additional information noted in the description for each item. If you're still unsure, just let me know!
templates.name: Sizing

templates.content:
All styles with Contour Plus technology provide
good arch support.
templates.name: Which style provides good arch support?

templates.content: All of our shoes soles pass standard tests for abrasion resistance (SATRA TM 362) and have the standard slip resistance, but only some of our shoes with rubber outsoles have superior slip resistant for wet and icy grounds.
templates.name: Are any of your shoes slip resistant?

templates.content: We recommend for leather shoes to be cleaned with a damp cloth and let is dry in a ventilated place without direct sunlight exposure.
templates.name: How do I clean my shoes? Any steps to  take?

templates.content: The price isn't included in the package. The return slip only has your itemized list of purchase. Boxes for Naturalizer come inside a brown box, different from other brands from Caleres.

templates.content: A portion of the shoes are considered vegan as they're made from synthetic or fabric uppers but not all our shoes are vegan.

templates.content: Unfortunately once you place your order, we can't cancel or edit it. To get a refund, you'll need to wait for the item to arrive and then return it easily by going to our Returns page here: https://naturalizer.attn.tv/sl/eSq_G3GM From there, choose the best return method for you.
